title: Alex Dickerson Joins Us to Discuss Friendship, Careers, Angry Cats, and Bad Break-Ups.
itunes:title: Alex Dickerson Joins Us to Discuss Friendship, Careers, Angry Cats, and Bad Break-Ups.
description:
In this episode, we are joined our third sorority house member (and other best friend), Alex Dickerson. It's a longer episode and we talk about everything from friendship and dating to careers and going back to school for na MBA. There's also a mini Grace roast and a few embarrassing stories. Alex has had an incredible career thus far, complete with nearly being the star of a reality TV show and going to business school in Barcelona. We also talk about her messy dating story (+ broken engagement), and how that has shaped her into the person she is today. This episode was so much fun, and we hope you love Alex as much as we do! 

Also in this episode, Becca has purchased a fancy home luggage stand, and Grace is obsessed with Sephora’s new clean beauty line. If you’re looking for a new read, join us for our July book club where we talk about American Spy.

Sponsors:

  • Night Pillow:
    • For 20% off your entire order, visit discovernight.com and enter code BOP20 at checkout.
  • Modern Fertility:
    • For $20 off your first kit, visit modernfertility.com/BOP.

Books Mentioned:

Tell Me Lies

Save Me the Plums

Three Women
